title: What can I take as a testosterone suppressor during a lockdown? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you expressing a frustration with a lack of sexual contact? I do not believe any doctor would willingly give you a testosterone suppressor. I imagine you can check out the internet and determine what might assist you in your dilemma and then find one of those on line pharmacies. But you should not do that. Some of the ‘cures’ might have less than pleasant results for you, Ray.

Assuming you are thinking of starting HRT, get an appointment with a endocrinologist or through an LGBTQ clinic. Most offer tele-help appointments. You may be asked to go get a blood test. DO NOT try any over the counter or back alley stuff as your health is too important.
